code: const sendViaWhatsApp=(phone,message)=>{if(!message){console.warn("‚ö†Ô∏è No message provided to sendViaWhatsApp.");return;}const encodedMessage=encodeURIComponent(message);const url=`https://wa.me/${phone}?text=${encodedMessage}`;console.log("üîó WhatsApp URL:",url);window.open(url,"_blank");};export default sendViaWhatsApp;
